text:
Shooters Island, in Newark Bay, off the shore of Mariners Harbor, Staten Island, seen from the latter. On the island can
be seen the skeletons of shipbuilding works.
April 15, 1924
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the shipbuilding works on Shooters Island as seen from Mariners Harbor, Staten Island. Also
shown is the shore of Bayonne, New Jersey.
April 15, 1924
P. L. Sperr
title: Islands - Shooters Island - [Newark Bay - Mariners Harbor, Staten Island.]

text:
Shooters Island, in the Kill Van Kull, showing shipbuilding yards. View 1 and 2 are from the Staten Island shore and view 3 from the Bayonne Bridge.

P. L. Sperr

Views 1,2: February 15, 1932
View 3: May 19, 1935
title: Islands - Shooters Island - [Kill Van Kull.]
